entry.title: Change Current Working Directory of Emacs
entry.content:
• Change current working directory (cwd) on the fly: M-x cd , then input directory name;

  • Set default cwd permanently: add (cd ‘your_default_path’) or (setq default-directory ‘your-default-directory’) to ~/.emacs;
